components.label: Student Name
components.content: {{ data.studentFullName }} {{ data.pirStatus }}

components.label: Application Number | Location Name | Study Dates
components.content: Application #: {{ data.applicationNumber }} | Location: {{ data.institutionLocationName }}

components.label: Location Name
components.content:
<!--studentCustomProgram value is from the application dynamic data(text field) 
and studentSelectedProgram is from the program drop down -->
{{ data.studentCustomProgram ?? data.studentSelectedProgram }}

components.label: Location Name
components.content:
<!--studentCustomProgramDescription value is from the application dynamic data(text field) 
and studentSelectedProgram is from the program drop down-->
{{ data.studentCustomProgramDescription ?? data.studentSelectedProgram }}

components.label: Other reason
components.customConditional:
//The value of other is 1, so we are showing the Other Reason, when the Institution user selects Other
show=(data.pirDenyReasonId===1);

components.label: Program
components.placeholder: search for the program

components.label: Offering
components.placeholder: search for the offering

components.label: HTML
components.content: If program or study period does not exist

components.label: HTML
components.content: If the program the student would like to attend does not exist in StudentAid BC, you will need to create an approved program and offering entry.
